attributes.action: Remove parental rights from convicted Pedophiles
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: At the moment any convicted pedophile still maintains Parental Rights to their biological born children. Giving them the chance to see the child after their release. We the under signed would like anyone convicted of child abuse charges to lose all their parental rights, therefore making it easier for the family to move on without fear of the parent turning up on the door step.
